game.name: Robot Hero City Simulator 3D
game.description:
We are sure that you will meet a great proportion of fun and thrill in this brand new action game. Different types of weapons, addictive gameplay and a number of new things to explore! You will be given different individual missions, which you have to complete by following the instructions provided during the gameplay. Avoid getting hit by anything else in a number of day and night missions! Make sure not to step onto any traps, which can take your life. 

Robot Hero City Simulator 3D is a free online fighting game where simple gameplay and eye-popping graphics will be there all the time to keep you occupied for hours. Donâ€™t forget to upgrade your robot and complete a number of exciting tasks with a focused mind! In this 3D fighting game, you will have to operate a robot, who can also fly over the city using his jet pack. Help him to escape from the military and police and shoot his enemies through the bazooka!

Feel free to choose from a number of weapons like sword, spear, ax, giant hammer and other weapons in this one of the top robot games for kids! There are also different kinds of upgrades available for the robot. Try to play smartly while upgrading his speed, life points, strength and obtaining coins and bonus points! Destroy buildings and objects to earn good points that you can use to buy upgrades in your robot! Complete all 30 levels as fast as you can to become the champion in our all action games!
